// src/pages/QualityMonitorPage.js import React from 'react'; /** * Renders the Water Quality Monitor page content. */ const QualityMonitorPage = () => { // --- Data for the Quality Monitor Page --- // Top status cards data const topStatus = { overall: { status: 'WARNING', icon: '‚ö†Ô∏è' }, tds: { value: '0', unit: 'ppm', title: 'TDS LEVEL' } }; // Heavy Metals Table Data const heavyMetalsData = [ { metal: 'Lead', value: '12.50', unit: 'ppb', limit: '15 ppb', status: 'Safe' }, { metal: 'Arsenic', value: '0.20', unit: 'ppb', limit: '10 ppb', status: 'Safe' }, { metal: 'Mercury', value: '1.80', unit: 'ppb', limit: '2 ppb', status: 'Safe' }, ]; return (

Water Quality Monitor

Real-time quality parameters and contamination detection

{/* --- 1. Top Status Cards Row --- */}
{/* Overall Status Card */}

WATER QUALITY

{topStatus.overall.icon}

Overall status

{topStatus.overall.status}

{/* TDS Level Card */}

{topStatus.tds.title}

üíß

Total Dissolved Solids

{topStatus.tds.value} {topStatus.tds.unit}

{/* --- 2. TDS Monitor Section --- */}

üî¨ TDS Monitor (Total Dissolved Solids)

0.00 ppm

‚úÖ Within Safe Range

{/* --- 3. Heavy Metals Detection Table --- */}

{heavyMetalsData.map((data, index) => ( ))}
Metal Value Limit Status
{data.metal} {data.value} {data.unit} {data.limit} {data.status}
); }; export default QualityMonitorPage;
